title: lv.100 Doom-bots Incentive Like Star Guardian
body:
Level 100 Doombots is probably the hardest thing to achieve in league, however there is little incentive to actually win it. some players playing it (looking at the yasuos, rivens) have no idea how to play it, and dont even want to win it. This is insanely frustrating for people who want to win it, as winning heavily depends on the luck you get (not getting matched with a combination of malz, wukong, yasuo, lux bot). This could be solved by adding a incentive to win.

Now I know this sounds like a cash grab, however I think its actually a feasible idea. Riot already demonstrated they could do this with the Star Guardian event, where people were offered 1k RP for finishing it on S+. Since its Halloween is just around the corner, and Doombots is a heavily underappreciated gamemode, I'd love to see an incentive placed for defeating 100 Doombots

Other than that, it took me 60 tries to win level 100 doom bots, and only 2 to get S+ on Star Guardian.

replies.body: I am one of those Yasuos
